decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (103RA-3-00-01A Received: 11 September 2017
 103RA-3-01-01A Received: 29 September 2017, 103RA-302-01D  and 103RA-3-01-02E Received:  18 January 2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The first flloor windowformed in the western side elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 6 - The extension hereby approved shall be used solely as part of the house known as 103 Rochester Avenue, Feltham and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling nor used for business purposes and the premises shall not be used as a house in multiple occupation, including any use within Class C4 of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended) or such other legislation as may subsequently supersede it.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension, a single storey side/rear extension, front porch and a boundary wall
